components.description:
A place to store notes and other office materials. Primarily used by older people.

Generally shown as a brown case with a handle on top, and a silver or gold colored clasp on the front. Facebook shows two leather straps on the front.
components.title: Briefcase

description:
A place to store notes and other office materials. Primarily used by older people.

Generally shown as a brown case with a handle on top, and a silver or gold colored clasp on the front. Facebook shows two leather straps on the front.
title: Briefcase

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Office symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A place to store notes and other office materials. Primarily used by older men. Briefcase was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and ad http://emojipedia.org/briefcase/
emoji_net_data.name: briefcase

bn:00014137n: The type of enterprise in which businesses or organizations are engaged.
The activity of providing goods and services involving financial and commercial and industrial aspects
A commercial organization or a small business.
An entity that provides goods and/or services to others.
An organisation that is not a business.
A business or organization that has provided a coupon that can be used at their store.
Organization involved in the trade of goods, services, or both to consumers
A business, also known as an enterprise or a firm, is an organization involved in the trade of goods, services, or both to consumers.

Business may refer to many differing activities, such as the activity of buying or selling in trade, a commercial firm or enterprise, one's personal affairs or concerns, one's regular occupation, employment, or profession, something acquiring attention, or a situation, matter or happening.

bn:00013104n: A case with a handle; for carrying papers or files or books
A flat, usually rigid, rectangular briefcase for carrying business papers, documents, or the like.
A flat, rectangular case with a handle, often of leather, used for carrying papers or books.
A case used for carrying documents (especially by business people)
A small case for carrying important documents; a briefcase.
A briefcase is a narrow box-shaped bag or case used mainly for carrying papers and other documents and equipped with a handle.
